channel.title: Olympus 317 PK-Based Brand new
channel.description:
Welcome to the Olympus server page! Starting at 3/13/15 we our a brand new server and hope you give us a chance when choosing your next rsps. Here at Olympus our goal is to provide the best rsps environment for our users. We listen to our players and treat them with respect because without them, we are nothing. With constant updates, 24/7 uptime, and a friendly community, we feel we have created a server where anyone can come online and have a good time. Check out some of our features below for a closer look at what Olympus is like.
Website(very simple - still looking for a good website developer!) [url=http://www.olympus-rsps.com]Olympus RSPS[/url]
Features:
- 24/7 VPS hosted uptime - Mouse scrolling camera movement supported - Custom achievement system (over 30 achievements) - Great donator benefits - Friendly community - Great economy - Fast switching - Full dicing/flower game - Play on resizable or full screen - Full curses - Full treasure trails system - KDR highscores - Imp catching throughout wilderness - Great bosses - So much more!
Choose your own path!
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/25iukhf.png[/img]
30+ Achievements! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/e7e521.png[/img]
Active Pk Community! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/hvxjjc.png[/img]
Active Community Growing Daily! (3/30/15) [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2uohycx.png[/img]
Play In Full Screen! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/nh12jd.png[/img]
Try your luck at luring or deep wildy pking! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/16m6921.png[/img]
Barrows Store! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/14lkk1h.png[/img]
Make money by catching and looting imps spawned throughout the wildy! [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/4qjx8o.png[/img]
Make extra thieving money through the wilderness chest! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/fx89d.png[/img]
Compete with others to become the best pker! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/30atnuo.png[/img]
Multiple wilderness bosses and elite slayer tasks! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/15cyiyx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/11kb59j.png[/img]
Unique donor store with some awesome custom items! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/20g1d0l.png[/img]
I honestly built this server just to have a good time playing with some friends before we actually started to build a decent player base. I know it is far from perfect but a lot of time and effort has gone into this server and it would really mean a lot if you could show some support :)

item.title: Olympus 317 PK-Based Brand new
item.dc:creator: @dcooley dcooley
item.description:
@dcooley wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:550723”]You have a pretty basic homepage for a RSPS, and considering it doesn’t really match a RSPS type feel. The theme used on that forum though kind of looks bad but isn’t top priority at the moment for you, I’m sure.

Is your fullscreen completely functional as one should be (e.g. everything is clickable [sometimes I’ve seen fullscreen opt’s. mess with certain interfaces and such which make it near impossible to navigate on the opt.])?

And what is the reasoning for having a barrows shop besides for people that choose the PK path? Unless you’ve made the server so that people who only choose the PK shop, I would imagine that this would ignore the whole thing about where you can choose a PK path or regular path.

Other than that, I like the little imp feature in the wild and thieving thing in the wild as well. Good luck with the server, I’m sure it’ll grow in time with a little bit of patience and love.

Also, you have two pictures of your barrows shop.[/quote]

Ya for the homepage (since I am not too good at website development) I decided to go for something simple that looks nice and gets the job done(same with the forums). Still looking for a decent website developer that can help me with that kind of stuff. The main reason for the barrows shop was for pkers and for people that wanted to sell barrows items they did not want. With a smaller player base it can be a pain to have to worry about buying certain items from players. I will probably remove as the player base grows to get the economy going. I really appreciate your feedback

Read full topic

item.title: Olympus 317 PK-Based Brand new
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You have a pretty basic homepage for a RSPS, and considering it doesn’t really match a RSPS type feel. The theme used on that forum though kind of looks bad but isn’t top priority at the moment for you, I’m sure.

Is your fullscreen completely functional as one should be (e.g. everything is clickable [sometimes I’ve seen fullscreen opt’s. mess with certain interfaces and such which make it near impossible to navigate on the opt.])?

And what is the reasoning for having a barrows shop besides for people that choose the PK path? Unless you’ve made the server so that people who only choose the PK shop, I would imagine that this would ignore the whole thing about where you can choose a PK path or regular path.

Other than that, I like the little imp feature in the wild and thieving thing in the wild as well. Good luck with the server, I’m sure it’ll grow in time with a little bit of patience and love.

Also, you have two pictures of your barrows shop.

Read full topic
